text: “Handina kuve ndinovaudza kusara kweizvo imi (Allah) makave munondikomekedza kuti ndive ndiovaudza kuti: ‘Namatai Allah, Tenzi vangu uye Tenzi venyu.’ Uye ndakanga ndiri mupupuri kwavari apo pandange ndiri mavari. Asi pamakandisumudza, ndimi chete maiona zvose kubva mavari. Uye munoona zvose (muri mupupuri wezvose).” (Iyi iyambiro huru kumaKristu ese epasi rose)
